trans-unit.source: [AZURE.WARNING] HDInsight clusters are billed hourly, whether you are using them or not.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.WARNING] HDInsight clusters are billed hourly, whether you are using them or not.

trans-unit.source: Please be sure to delete your cluster after you have finished using it.
trans-unit.target: Please be sure to delete your cluster after you have finished using it.

trans-unit.source: For information on deleting a cluster, see [How to delete an HDInsight cluster](../articles/hdinsight/hdinsight-delete-cluster.md).
trans-unit.target: For information on deleting a cluster, see [How to delete an HDInsight cluster](../articles/hdinsight/hdinsight-delete-cluster.md).
